channel.title: Graphix
channel.description:
please som1 help
i need to change the graphix for ss spec and vengence ss : it has the right emote (and i have the graphic ID for the lighting) but atm when u spec it it gives u the exploding thing from pest control i need to change how i do that? and veng same thing but instead of skull i get a xploding thing also
